data.name: Usurper: Soulbound
data.detailed_description:
“Absorb my power and glory shall be yours”. - The Usurper King

Gameplay

Use the power of the Usurper to fight your way through horrifyingly beautiful planes of existence and possess your enemies to undo what has been done. Experience enchanting and colorful NPC’s who will “help” you on your path.




  • Action RPG experience with tough but fair SOULS-LIKE combat
  • Enjoy the game in great company with LOCAL-CO OP or ONLINE with Steam Remote Play (see further below for instructions)
  • Unique "USURPING" ability to Possess enemies and gain new abilities
  • Mix of hand crafted and randomly generated environments

Online Play with Steam Remote Play

To play Usurper online with your Steam friends (People you want to play with must be in your steam friend list) follow the instructions below
  • Launch the game.
  • Make sure your friend is logged in to Steam
  • Open your Steam Overlay in-game (shift+tab).
  • From your friends list, select 'Remote Play Together'.
  • Your friend will receive an invite. Once your friend accepts the invite, they will be in-game with you.

Story

This is the tale of a King, whose rule was so horrifying, that his soul refused to move on and clinged to the world of the living by possessing the bodies of others by using the power of the Usurper.

Heroes united in locking him away and there was once again peace in the land….
Until you, my dear Hero, ruined that peace with your ignorance and greed.

From even the greatest of horrors irony is seldom absent. - H.P Lovecraft

data.short_description: Usurper: Soulbound is a tough Rogue-lite Action RPG. Players are trapped without a physical body in a horrifying dimension and must possess the bodies of their enemies and other heroes alike as they fight their way back.
data.reviews:
“For Souls-like fans, Usurper: Soulbound is definitely one to keep an eye on.”
TheGameCrater

“Usurper: Soulbound is an interesting souls-like rogue-lite ARPG that is already looking up to be a very solid game with a promising future”
RespawnIsland

“… those who enjoy souls-like games will feel right at home here. Usurper: Soulbound usurping mechanic is quite unique and makes the battles in this game different to most other similar games.”
SaveOrQuit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 290X
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Try Gamepad For Better Experience
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K or AMD Ryzen 7 2700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Try Gamepad For Better Experience
